text:
When the length of the string to be decoded is not a factor of 4, a
StringIndexOutOfBoundsException is thrown from one of the charAt() calls. It
would be nice if the method checked for this abnormal situation and threw a
checked exception.

You want it, well, here it is:

org.apache.xml.security.exceptions.Base64DecodingException
